name: Wallet Agent
description:
I'm the Felix wallet specialist. I can help you with:
- Checking your wallet balance
- Reviewing wallet transactions
- Adding funds
- Managing payment methods

tools.name: get_balance
tools.description: Get the user's current wallet balance.

tools.name: get_transactions
tools.description: Get the user's recent wallet transactions.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of transactions to return

tools.name: get_payment_methods
tools.description: Get payment methods linked to wallet.

tools.name: add_funds
tools.description: Add funds to the wallet from a linked payment method.
tools.confirmation_template: Confirm adding ${amount} USD to your wallet?
